original_text: And behold at eveningtide trouble; and before the morning he is not. This is the portion of them that spoil us, and the lot of them that rob us.
korean_text: 보라 저녁에 두려움을 당하고 아침이 오기 전에 그들이 없어졌나니 이는 우리를 노략한 자들의 몫이요 우리를 강탈한 자들의 보응이니라

sentences.original_text: and before the morning he is not
This is the portion of them that spoil us
and the lot of them that rob us
